Size: 192 Bytes
Session Control: 0x01 - VW Default Diagnostic Session (R) 0x03 - Extended Session (R/W)
Security Access Level: Read: No Access Protection Write: E2E
Parameters: Diagnostic Address Bus Address
Format: n * Element / Entry Each Element - 3 Bytes Diagnostic Address - 2 Bytes - (Bit start-stop: 0,0 - 1,7 ) Bus Address - 1 Byte (Bit start-stop: 2,0 - 2,7 )
Note: Max n value can be 64 (3*64 = 192).
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_22004 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR ASIL: QM
